name: Apo
description: Apo was rescued as a young stray near the market. She loves people, learns quickly, and would do well in a family that gives her daily walks.
tagline: A sweet puppy ready for her first real home.

name: Tasi
description: Tasi is a calm dog who likes to sit near people and watch the street. He is medium energy and would fit well with a quiet, steady household.
tagline: Perfect companion for a relaxed family.

name: Lua
description: Lua is a strong, loyal dog that takes time to trust new people but becomes very attached once she does. She likes having a yard and clear routines.
tagline: A loyal guardian for a patient family.

name: Moana
description: Moana loves running on the beach and playing with other dogs. She needs an active home that can give her exercise and mental stimulation.

name: Toa
description: Toa is a senior dog who enjoys naps in the shade and gentle walks. He would do best with a family that appreciates a calm, older dog.
tagline: A wise old boy who just wants a soft place to rest.

name: Lani
description: Lani is shy at first but becomes very cuddly once she feels safe. She prefers a quieter home and does well indoors.
tagline: A shy heart that warms up with kindness.

name: Milo
description: Milo is a fun-loving young dog that loves games and training time. He can be a bit noisy when excited and needs patient guidance.
tagline: A goofy best friend in training.

name: Sena
description: Sena has a balanced personalityâ€”she enjoys play but can also settle quietly. She would do well with families who want a flexible, easy-going dog.
tagline: Easy-going girl who fits in almost anywhere.

name: Tui
description: Tui is a small but confident dog who makes a good watch dog. He likes having one or two main people and can be protective of them.

name: Sisi
description: Sisi is patient and gentle, making her a great match for families with young children or elderly relatives.

name: Koko
description: Koko is strong and energetic. He needs an experienced owner who can offer consistent training and space to run.
tagline: A strong partner for confident handlers.

name: Lea
description: Lea is an older dog who likes quiet spaces, soft beds, and slow walks. She does not need much activity but loves gentle company.
tagline: A gentle senior looking for a soft retirement home.

name: Pule
description: Pule is clever and food-motivated, making him great for training games. He needs mental stimulation and clear boundaries.
tagline: Smart boy who loves learning new tricks.

name: Naia
description: Naia is a young, affectionate pup who loves snuggling as much as playing. She would do well with kids who can be gentle with her.

name: Rangi
description: Rangi is calm and confident, not easily startled by noise or movement. He enjoys having a job, even if it is just watching the gate.

name: Fetu
description: Fetu loves meeting new people and is very social. She is a great match for households that often have visitors or family gatherings.
tagline: Social butterfly who loves every visitor.
